# Simulate Data
```{r}
simulated_ghr_data <-
  tibble(
    country =
      c("Argentina", "USA", "Belize", "China", "France", "Italy", "Japan", "Kenya", "Germany", "Canada"),
    happiness =
      runif(n = 10, min = 0, max = 10),
    healthy_mortality =
      runif(n = 10, min = 55, max = 85)
  )


simulated_HDI <-
  tibble(
    country =
      c("Argentina", "USA", "Belize", "China", "France", "Italy", "Japan", "Kenya", "Germany", "Canada"),
    income =
      runif(n = 10, min = 20000, max = 100000),
    healthcare =
      rbinom(n = 10, size = 1, prob = .5)
  )
```
